verses.verse: מִשְׁלֵ֗י <S%H4912><s%> The proverbs שְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon פ בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son חָ֭כָם <S%H2450><s%> A wise יְשַׂמַּח־ <S%H8055><s%> maketh a glad אָ֑ב <S%H1><s%> father וּבֵ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> son כְּ֝סִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> but a foolish תּוּגַ֥ת <S%H8424><s%> [is] the heaviness אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> of his mother

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not י֭וֹעִילוּ <S%H3276><s%> profit אוֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H214><s%> Treasures רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> nothing but righteousness תַּצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> delivereth מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> from death

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַרְעִ֣יב <S%H7456><s%> to famish יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous וְהַוַּ֖ת <S%H1942><s%> the substance רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יֶהְדֹּֽף׃ <S%H1920><s%> but he casteth away

רָ֗אשׁ <S%H7326><s%> He becometh poor עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that dealeth כַף־ <S%H3709><s%> hand רְמִיָּ֑ה <S%H7423><s%> [with] a slack וְיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> but the hand חָרוּצִ֣ים <S%H2742><s%> of the diligent תַּעֲשִֽׁיר׃ <S%H6238><s%> maketh rich

אֹגֵ֣ר <S%H103><s%> He that gathereth בַּ֭קַּיִץ <S%H7019><s%> in summer בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> [is] a wise נִרְדָּ֥ם <S%H7290><s%> [but] he that sleepeth בַּ֝קָּצִ֗יר <S%H7105><s%> in harvest בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> [is] a son מֵבִֽישׁ׃ <S%H954><s%> that causeth shame

בְּ֭רָכוֹת <S%H1293><s%> Blessings לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [are] upon the head צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the just וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> covereth חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> but violence

זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> The memory צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> of the just לִבְרָכָ֑ה <S%H1293><s%> [is] blessed וְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> but the name רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יִרְקָֽב׃ <S%H7537><s%> shall rot

חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> The wise לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> in heart יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> will receive מִצְוֹ֑ת <S%H4687><s%> commandments וֶאֱוִ֥יל <S%H191><s%> fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <S%H8193><s%> but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <S%H3832><s%> shall fall

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walketh בַּ֭תֹּם <S%H8537><s%> uprightly יֵ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walks בֶּ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> surely וּמְעַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6140><s%> but he that perverteth דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו <S%H1870><s%> his ways יִוָּדֵֽעַ׃ <S%H3045><s%> shall be known

קֹ֣רֵֽץ <S%H7169><s%> He that winketh עַ֭יִן <S%H5869><s%> with the eye יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> causeth עַצָּ֑בֶת <S%H6094><s%> sorrow וֶאֱוִ֥יל <S%H191><s%> fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <S%H8193><s%> but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <S%H3832><s%> shall fall

מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> [man is] a well חַ֭יִּים <S%H2416><s%> of life פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> The mouth צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of a righteous וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> covereth חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> but violence

שִׂ֭נְאָה <S%H8135><s%> Hatred תְּעוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5782><s%> stirreth up מְדָנִ֑ים <S%H4090><s%> strifes וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H6588><s%> all sins תְּכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> covereth אַהֲבָֽה׃ <S%H160><s%> but love

בְּשִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> In the lips נָ֭בוֹן <S%H995><s%> of him that hath understanding תִּמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> is found חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט <S%H7626><s%> but a rod לְגֵ֣ו <S%H1460><s%> [is] for the back חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> of him that is void לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of understanding

חֲכָמִ֥ים <S%H2450><s%> Wise יִצְפְּנוּ־ <S%H6845><s%> [men] lay up דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge וּפִֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> but the mouth אֱ֝וִיל <S%H191><s%> of the foolish מְחִתָּ֥ה <S%H4288><s%> destruction קְרֹבָֽה׃ <S%H7138><s%> [is] near

ה֣וֹן <S%H1952><s%> wealth עָ֭שִׁיר <S%H6223><s%> The rich man's קִרְיַ֣ת <S%H7151><s%> city עֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> [is] his strong מְחִתַּ֖ת <S%H4288><s%> the destruction דַּלִּ֣ים <S%H1800><s%> of the poor רֵישָֽׁם׃ <S%H7389><s%> [is] their poverty

פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <S%H6468><s%> The labour צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous לְחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> [tendeth] to life תְּבוּאַ֖ת <S%H8393><s%> the fruit רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> to sin

אֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> He [is in] the way לְ֭חַיִּים <S%H2416><s%> of life שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> that keepeth מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction וְעוֹזֵ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> but he that refuseth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <S%H8433><s%> reproof מַתְעֶֽה׃ <S%H8582><s%> erreth

מְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> He that hideth שִׂ֭נְאָה <S%H8135><s%> hatred שִׂפְתֵי־ <S%H8193><s%> lips שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [with] lying וּמוֹצִ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and he that uttereth דִ֝בָּ֗ה <S%H1681><s%> a slander ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְסִֽיל׃ <S%H3684><s%> [is] a fool

בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> In the multitude דְּ֭בָרִים <S%H1697><s%> of words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֶחְדַּל־ <S%H2308><s%> there wanteth פָּ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> not sin וְחֹשֵׂ֖ךְ <S%H2820><s%> but he that refraineth שְׂפָתָ֣יו <S%H8193><s%> his lips מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> [is] wise

כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver נִ֭בְחָר <S%H977><s%> [is as] choice לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> The tongue צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the just לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked כִּמְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> [is] little worth

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> The lips צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יִרְע֣וּ <S%H7462><s%> feed רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וֶֽ֝אֱוִילִ֗ים <S%H191><s%> but fools בַּחֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> for want לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> of wisdom יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

בִּרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> The blessing יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> that תַעֲשִׁ֑יר <S%H6238><s%> it maketh rich וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יוֹסִ֖ף <S%H3254><s%> and he addeth עֶ֣צֶב <S%H6089><s%> no sorrow עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> is like

כִּשְׂח֣וֹק <S%H7814><s%> [It is] as sport לִ֭כְסִיל <S%H3684><s%> to a fool עֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do זִמָּ֑ה <S%H2154><s%> mischief וְ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> hath wisdom לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but a man תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> of understanding

מְגוֹרַ֣ת <S%H4034><s%> The fear רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he תְבוֹאֶ֑נּוּ <S%H935><s%> it shall come וְתַאֲוַ֖ת <S%H8378><s%> upon him but the desire צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יִתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> shall be granted

כַּעֲב֣וֹר <S%H5674><s%> passeth ס֭וּפָה <S%H5492><s%> As the whirlwind וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> so [is] the wicked וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> no [more] but the righteous יְס֣וֹד <S%H3247><s%> foundation עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [is] an everlasting

כַּחֹ֤מֶץ ׀ <S%H2558><s%> As vinegar לַשִּׁנַּ֗יִם <S%H8127><s%> to the teeth וְכֶעָשָׁ֥ן <S%H6227><s%> and as smoke לָעֵינָ֑יִם <S%H5869><s%> to the eyes כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So הֶ֝עָצֵ֗ל <S%H6102><s%> so [is] the sluggard לְשֹׁלְחָֽיו׃ <S%H7971><s%> to them that send

יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תּוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> prolongeth יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וּשְׁנ֖וֹת <S%H8141><s%> but the years רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תִּקְצֹֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7114><s%> shall be shortened

תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת <S%H8431><s%> The hope צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous שִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> [shall be] gladness וְתִקְוַ֖ת <S%H8615><s%> but the expectation רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> shall perish

מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> [is] strength לַ֭תֹּם <S%H8537><s%> to the upright דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה <S%H4288><s%> but destruction לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> [shall be] to the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> shall never בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest יִמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> be removed וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> but the wicked לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> shall not inhabit אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> The mouth צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> of the just יָנ֣וּב <S%H5107><s%> bringeth forth חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue תַּ֝הְפֻּכ֗וֹת <S%H8419><s%> but the froward תִּכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut out

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> The lips צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יֵדְע֣וּן <S%H3045><s%> know רָצ֑וֹן <S%H7522><s%> what is acceptable וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> but the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H8419><s%> [speaketh] frowardness
